1: If the Lord had not been on our side (let all Israel admit it), if the Lord had not been on our side,
2-3: we would have been swallowed alive by our enemies, destroyed by their anger.
4-5: We would have drowned beneath the flood of these men's fury and pride.
6: Blessed be Jehovah who has not let them devour us.
7: We have escaped with our lives as a bird from a hunter's snare. The snare is broken and we are free!
8: Our help is from the Lord who made heaven and earth.
